review: Love the Google Chromecast.  I wish I had bought it a long time ago.  Sure is much less expensive than buying a smart TV.
author: John McDonald

review: If you like watching lagging video, like it was 1995, this is the product for you! I specifically bought this to watch HBO Now, and it doesn't matter whether I launch the Chromecast from my iPhone app or my computer, the video stops and buffers as much as it plays. Simply put, it doesn't work as advertised.
author: R. Ferguson

review: This has been a great product. Only being able to plug in one small device and cast from my phone is a great feature. Crystal clear quality and all my apps work!
